name: minions-qa-rules-workspace
description: Validation rules, consistency checks, compliance gates, and auto-fix definitions
author: Mehdi Nabhani <mehdi@the-mehdi.com> (https://the-mehdi.com)

scripts.build: pnpm --filter @minions-qa-rules/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-qa-rules/cli run build && pnpm --filter @minions-qa-rules/docs run build && pnpm --filter @minions-qa-rules/blog run build && pnpm --filter @minions-qa-rules/web run build
scripts.deploy:blog: pnpm --filter @minions-qa-rules/blog run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/blog/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter @minions-qa-rules/docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm --filter @minions-qa-rules/web run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/web/dist --prod
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter @minions-qa-rules/sdk run build && pnpm --filter @minions-qa-rules/sdk run lint && pnpm --filter @minions-qa-rules/cli run lint
